about_the_game:
Simulo is a 2D physics sandbox game where you can do Anything*. Users can use a variety of in-game tools to build Whatever they could possibly imagine, from simple contraptions like cars to complex machinery. Or, you can just use it to mess around with ragdolls.

     *not anything but Almost

What can I Do with Simulo game?

Once you open Simulo revolutionary 2D physics sandbox, you will find some of the things you can do include:

  • Build machinery and contraptions like cars, pistons, elevators

  • Mess around with 2D ragdolls, such as humanoids or the Simulo Mascot thing (simulon!!)

  • Play around with things made by the community, such as scenes, objects, or even custom tools they made

Now you see that Simulo can do Anything (almost). Truly, this game is a true delight indeed.

short_description: A 2D physics sandbox game where you can build and share creations. Features include a simple and intuitive interface, custom tools, Lua scripting, and more. Users can create simple or complex contraptions with a variety of in-game tools.
